description: This React component 'LineChart.jsx' renders a responsive line chart with theme-aware colors, handling loading and empty data states. It uses 'recharts' library and custom styling, and is part of a dashboard UI.

methods.name: LineChart({ data, color = "#7C3AED", title = "Events over time", loading = false })
methods.description: Functional React component rendering a responsive line chart with customizable color, title, and loading state. Processes input data for display.
